title: Report: Colston has separated shoulder
text:
he NFL Network's Ian Rapoport reports that Saints receiver Marques Colston has a separated shoulder. Post to Facebook Report: Colston separated shoulder he NFL Network's Ian Rapoport reports that Saints receiver Marques Colston has a separated shoulder.  //on.wwltv.com/1RCZkKt   Report: Colston separated shoulder WWLTV.com 2:08 p.m. CDT October 12, 2015 Oct 11, 2015; Philadelphia, PA, USA; New Orleans Saints wide receiver Marques Colston (12) makes a catch and is tackled by Philadelphia Eagles cornerback Byron Maxwell (31) during the third quarter at Lincoln Financial Field. Mandatory Credit: Bill Streicher-USA TODAY Sports (Photo: Bill Streicher, Bill Streicher-USA TODAY Sports) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
METAIRIE, La. - The NFL Network's Ian Rapoport reports that Saints receiver Marques Colston has a separated shoulder. 
Rapoport said his source told him that there could be structural damage as well. 
Colston seemed to be noticeably favoring his shoulder midway through the game. 
Colston, who has 18 catches for 200 yards for the year, had three grabs for 36 yards against the Eagles. 
He has not appeared to be the same player who has been a stalwart since arriving as a late round draft pick in 2006. Read or Share this story: http://on.wwltv.com/1RCZkKt TOP VIDEOS
